sentences.en: He was totally overawed by his father.
The entire metropolitan center possessed a high and mighty air calculated to overawe and abash the common applicant.
sentences.cn: 整个市中心区有着一种高傲的神气,好像故意要让一些前来寻找职业的普通人感到惶恐不安.

sentences.en: Truth does not strike a pose to overawe people but talks and acts honestly and sincerely.
sentences.cn: 凡真理都不装样子吓人,它只是老老实实地说下去和做下去.

trans.tran_en: to make someone feel respect or fear, so that they are nervous or unable to say or do anything
